mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders_details (o_no, p_no, quantity) VALUES (#{oNo}, #{pNo}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders_details SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE o_no = #{oNo} AND p_no = #{pNo} AND quantity > 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM orders_details WHERE o_no = #{oNo} AND p_no = #{pNo}
mapper.select: SELECT od.*, p.p_name, p.p_price FROM orders_details od JOIN products p ON od.p_no = p.no WHERE od.o_no = #{oNo}
